lyrics:
La la la la
La la la la
La la la la (oh yeah)
La la la la

I want you to love me
Like I'm a hot ride
Be thinkin' of me
Doin' what you like

So boy, forget about the world
'Cause it's gon' be me and you tonight
I wanna make you beg for it
Then I'mma make you swal[...]
